verses.name: Genesis 31:9
verses.text: Thus God hath taken away the cattle of your father, and given them to me.

verses.name: Genesis 31:10
verses.text: And it came to pass at the time that the cattle conceived, that I lifted up mine eyes, and saw in a dream, and, behold, the rams which leaped upon the cattle were ringstraked, speckled, and grisled.

verses.name: Genesis 31:11
verses.text: And the angel of God spake unto me in a dream, saying, Jacob: And I said, Here am I.
